Class Summary
ResultVisualizer Handler to process and visualize a Result.
ResultVisualizer.Parameterizer Parameterization class.
ResultWindow Swing window to manage a particular result visualization.
SelectionTableWindow Visualizes selected Objects in a JTable, objects can be selected, changed and deleted
SimpleSVGViewer A minimalistic SVG viewer with export dialog.
